ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Mesmerisation
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope,  I ve successfully enthralled what s on the stage from a distance with no problem.  It helps when we re initially breaking the room. :)  I also use
ygData.messageBody:
Nope, I've successfully enthralled what's on the stage from a distance
with no problem. It helps when we're initially breaking the room. :) I
also use Tashani to pull off the stage as well. :)

I'll be playing again tonight, so I'll let you guys know how it goes. :)

Rumor has it though in the preacher room if you walk on the stage it will
cause the Preacher not to spawn, Is this true? He only spawned twice all
day yesterday (and my group was very careful not to walk on the stage.
heh). Any truth in this? :)

Ezrae Dreamstealer
Lvl 23 DE Enchantress
Brell Serilis


On Mon, 20 Mar 2000,
JasonF wrote:

.From: "JasonF" <jasonf@...>
.
.I was about to say.. The dias that the Preacher and Placeholder spawn on my
.cause you problems. Maybe you're getting the "You cannot see your target."
.message? I've used Mesmerization from a loooong way off.
.
.[48 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work
.[23 Enchanter] Chiming (Erudite) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work
.
.> From: Jenni <freya@...>
.>
.> I'll definately do that. :) It might have been the hilly terrain I was on
.> interferring with the distance factor.
.> We've been breaking the spawn in the preacher room good enough that the
.> preacher (when and if he spawns) is usually up there alone when he spawns.
.> It's the fun pulls from back stage, and the other rooms around us that
.> sometimes get a little big. :) I suppose I could back up toward the stage
.> a bit for those though.. I'll play with it a bit more and see how it
.> goes. :)
.>
.> Thanks for the help!! :)
.>
.> Ezrae Dreamstealer
.> Lvl 23 DE Enchantress
.> Brell Serilis
